fabyans cronycle newly prynted wyth cronycle actes dedes done tyme reygne moste excellent prynce kynge henry vii father vnto drad souerayne lord kynge henry viii honour reuerece ioyfull contynaunce prosperous reygne pleasure god weale realme amen pprentyd london wyllyam rastell cvm privilegio mvsevm britannicvm british museum blazon coat arm table fyrste volume fabyanes cronycle albyon thys ile olde tyme called apereth fourth lefe fyrst chapytre brute sonne siluius hys orygynall fyrste comyng thys lande ca ii folio iiii brute hys fyrst landynge ca iii fo v thys brute son siluius posthumus descended noble blode troyans entred fyrst ye ile albion named brytayne called england yere worlde iiii thousande lxiii incarnacyon chryst begynnyng worke openly shewed reygned yeres xxiiii troynuaunt london thys kynge fyrst fou ded ca iiii fo v locrinus locryne eldeste sonne brute beganne hys reygne ouer brytayne countrye called leogria logiers named myddell englande ye yere worlde iiii thousande lxxxvii reygned yeres xx capi v folio vi gwendoloena gwendoleyn ye wyfe locryne began reygne quene ouer brytons countrey logiers yere worlde iiii thousande cvii reygned yeres xv ca vi fo vi madan sonne locrine sayd gwendolyne began hys reygne ouer brytons yere worlde iiii thousande c xxii reygned agrement many wryters moste yeres xl ca vii fo vi seconde yere thys kyng reygne ended thyrde age world dauyd began reygne ouer israell menpricus mempricius sonne madan beganne hys rule ouer brytons yere world iiiimclxii yere chrystes incarnacyon reygned yeres xx ca viii folio vi ebrancus ebrank sonn mempryce bega rule brytos yere worlde iiiimclxxxii reygned yeres xii thys kyng made citie yorke ye town acryncte castelles dunbarre eddynbourgh scotland ca ix fo vii brute vixii scutum brute greneshelde sonne ebranke made ruler brytons ye yere worlde iiiimiicxlii reygned yeres xii ca x fo vii leylus leyr sonne forenamed brute beganne hys rule ouer brytayn yere ye world iiiimiicliiii ruled yeres xxv thys kynge founded towne carleyll ca xi fo vii lud hurdibras rudibras sonn leyl bega hys dominio ouer ye brytos yere ye worlde iiiimiiclxxix ruled yeres xxxix kyng made wynchester caunterbury septo named shaftysbury ca xii fo vii baldud sonne lud began hys domynyon ouer brytaynes yere worlde iiii thousad iiicxviii reygned yeres xx thys kynge founded towne bathe bathe wythin wryters ca xiii folio vii leyr leyer sonne baldud made ruler ouer brytons yere worlde iiiim iiic xxxviii ruled yeres lx thys kynge made towne leycestre ca xiiii fo vii cordeilla yongeste doughter forenamed leyer beganne rule brytons yere worlde iiii thousande iiicxcviii ruled yeres v ca xvi folio viii cunedagius marganus neuewes sonnes two sister cordeilla beganne theyr dominyon ouer brytayne yere ye world iiii thousande iiii hundreth iii cotynued yeres ii ca xvii fo viii cunedagius forenamed batayll hadde slayne marganus beganne hys senyoury ouer brytons yere worlde iiiimiiiicv ruled moste wryters yeres xxxiii ca xviii fo ix reynaldus rilalnus sonn cunedagius beganne rule brytons yere world iiii thousande iiiic xxxviii reygned yeres xlv xxxii yere kyng rome bylded twoo bretherne remus romulus whyche yere worlde ca xix fo ix gurgustius gurgusto gorbodian sonne riuallus made ruler brytons ye yere worlde iiiimiiiiclxxxiii ruled yeres xxxviii ca xx fo ix sicillius siluius brother sonne gurgustus began hys domynyon ouer brytons yere world iiii thousand vc xxi ruled yeres xlix ca xxi folio ix iago lago neuewe gurgustius made ruler brytayn ye yere world iiii thousande v hundreth lxx reygned yeres xxv ca xxii fo ix kinimacus brother iago wryters sonne siluius began seygnyorye ouer brytons yere world iiii thousand vcxcv ruled yeres liiii xiiii yere thys kynge ended iiii age iewes captyued babylon also isopus isoppe feyner fable latter day thys kinimacus countre grece florysshed fayned hys fable ca xxiii fo ix gorbodug whome geffrey momouth nameth grobodugo son vnto kinimacus began hys domynion ouer brytons yere world iiii thousande vicxlix ruled yeres lxii aboute xxvi yere kynges reygne holiferne slayne iudyth wydow chamber papilio hath iacobus philippus ca xxiiii fo ix ferrex hys brother porrex sonnes gorbodug bega iointly rule ye brytos ye yere adam iiiimviic xi ruled yeres v endeth lyne ofspryng brute ca xxv fo x story agre ye deth forsayd bretherne brytos remayned heyre great dyscorde longe season subdued vnder diuers kynges bycause ye foresayd auctours nat certyfye ye terme dyscorde also wryte dyuersly reygnes forsayd kynges assyne certayn yeres many yeres thaccomptyng yeres tymes appereth great alteracyo therfore noted affermeth ranulph monke chester guydo galfryde cunedagius onely began reygne yere world iiii tyousande iiii hundreth v reygned xxxiii yeres whyche maketh yere worlde iiiimiiiic xxxviii furthermore foresayde authours wyth afferme ii bretherne belinus brennus dyd enter italy wyth great noumber men xi yere artaxarses xi kynge perse whyche yere worlde iiii thousand viiic xv viii yere reygne forsayd bretherne sayeth martynus super cronicas whereby playnly appereth laste yere cunedage vntyll eyghte yere foresayd bretherne passed iiiclxxvii yeres furthermore wryters afferme ye sayd belinus brennus dyd succede theyr father dumuallo sayde dumuallo reygned xl yeres fyrst yere whose reygne yere worlde iiiimviicxlviii laste yere cunedage vntyl fyrst yere sayd dunuallo passed iiicxxix yeres whych yeres passed fyrst yere riuallus renaldus vntyll laste yere porrex ii hudreth lxxviii yeres whyche accompte appereth brytos deth fore sayd bretherne dyscord space li yeres laste yere foresayde dyscorde yere worlde iiii thousande vii hundreth lxvii pthus endeth fyrst parte thys worke conteyneht viii hundreth iiii yeres mulumtius duuallo yt whiche wrytters named donobant sonn cloton duke kynge cornewall made kynge brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande vii hundreth lxviii reygned yeres xi thys fyrste bare crowne brytayne thys also founded towne malmesbury uyes thys also began iiii pryncipall hye wayes ca xxviii fo x belinus brennus twoo sonnes forenamed dunuallo beganne reygne ioyntly ouer brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande eyght hudreth viii ruled yeres ioyntly belynus alone xxvi thys belinus made towne carleyll also london caused made hauen byllyngysgate ended iiii wayes begonne hys fader thys also made teple londo named temple concorde whyche wryters opynyos shulde temple barre parysshe churche temple appereth ca xxix cum folio xi tyme whyche two bretherne reygned auctours somwhat dyscorde policronicon sayeth belinus wyth brennus dyd inuade italy besege rome cci yere trasmigragracion italy also tyme furius camillus dyctatour rome wherby appereth rome spoyled yere worlde iiiimviiic x iacobus phylyppus wyth sayth ye forsayd furius camillus dictatour rome yere lord iiiimviii hundreth lvi whereby appereth dyfference xlvi yeres radulphus monk order cystercieu erreth farre affermeth hys cronycle ye said bretherne began reyne ouer brytayn yere ye world iiiimvc iiii whych dyffereth frome aboue ii hundreth l yere noted ye sayde belynus reyned x yeres supposed tymes hys reyn hys retorne italy victory sayd bretherne shewed story folowyng gurguintus gurguyn son belyn made kynge brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande viiic xxxiiii reygned xix yeres ca xxxii fo xiii guithelinus guitellius called englysshe cronycle guentolyn sonne gurguintus made kynge brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande viiic liii reygned yeres xxvi alexander great began reygne aboute xxi yere thys kynge ca xxxiii fo xiiii sisillius cecilius sonn guithelinus began reygne ouer briton yere world iiii thousande viiiclxxix reygned yeres vii ca xxxiiii fo xiiii kymerus kymere sonn sisillius bega hys rule ouer ye brytons yere world iiiimviiiclxxxvi ruled yeres iii ca xxxv fo xiiii elanius sonne brother kymerus beganne hys reygne ouer brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande viii hundreth lxxxix reygned yeres ix ca xxxvi folio xiiii morindus marwyth bastarde sonne elanius made kynge brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande viii hundreth xci reygned yeres viii ca xxxvii fo xiiii gorbomannus englysshe cronycle granbodyan sonne vnto morindus ordeyned king brytayne yere world iiii thousand viiicxcviii reygned yeres xi ca xxxviii fo xv archigallo second sonne morindus beganne hys domynyon ouer brytons yere worlde iiii thousande ixcx reygned yeres v ca xxix fo xv elidurus iii sonne morindus began hys domynyon ouer brytons yere world iiii thousande ixcxv ruled yeres v ca xl fo xv archigallo beforenamed compassyo hys brother agayn restored hys former dygnyte ye yere worlde iiii thousande ix hundreth xx reyngned yeres x ca xli fo xv elidurus beforenamed agayne brytons made kynge yere worlde iiii thousad ix hundreth xxx reygned yeres ii ca xlii fo xv uigenius migenius wyth peridurus hys brother whyche englyshe cronycle named hygamus petitur brethern elidurus deposed strength theyr sayde brother began theyr reygne ye yere worlde iiii thousande ix hundreth xxxii reygned ioyntly alone yeres ix thys peridurus petitur made towne pykerynge opynyon dyuerse wryters ca xliii fo xv elidurus beforenamed thyrde tyme restored crowne yere worlde iiii thousad ix hudreth xli reygned thyrd tyme yeres iiii galfride sayeth ye durynge lyfe foresayd brethern thys inclosed towre london whych yf trew nat trew floure hystorys affermeth whych sayeth towre london bylded cassibelan ca xliiii fo xvi gorbonianus gorbomannus son elidure made kyng brytayne yere world iiii thousande ix hundreth xlv hym reygned xxxii kynges story declared yt wyth sayd gorbonmaus reason foloweth occupyed yeres lxxxvi thys tyme duke haniball cartage yere worlde began warre agaynst romayns scipio affrican vanquyshed hanyball aboute yere worlde vm ix thys tyme iudas machabeus duke israell began theyr capytayne say yere worlde v thousande xlvi ca xlvi fo xvi make storyes agre kepe order yeres begon fyrst noted sheweth ranulph wyth diuers iulius cesar made brytayn trybutary rome xlviii yere incarnacyon chryste yere worlde fyue thousande cli ix yere cassybelan whes takyng ye tyme cassybela trybute payd ix yeres tyme reygne lud xi yeres foloweth congruently kynge lud beganne reygne yere worlde fyue thousande cxxxi frome last yere elidure vntyll begynnyng reygne lud tyme ye xxxiii kynges passed clxxxvi yeres lud sonne hely last kynge forsayd xxxiii stablysshed kynge brytayne yere worlde fyue thousande cxxxi reygned yeres ix thys kynge made ludgate westgate london walled parte named cytye caerlud ca xlvii fo xvi cassibelan brother lud ordeyned kynge brytayn yere worlde fyue thousand cxlii reygned made trybutary romaynes yeres full viii ca xlviii folio xvi begynnyng thys trybute hath peter pyctauyensis polycronycon authours yere worlde v thousand cli xlviii yere cristes comynge eutropius sayeth hys cronicle caius iulius conquere brytayn ii yeres create emperour reygned emperour ii yeres furthermore sayde eutropius affermeth octauian augustus successour sayde iulius began reygne yere worlde v thousande clviii reygned full xli yeres cryste borne whyche sayeng iacobus philippus auctours afferme wherby foloweth iulius cesar subdued brytayne xlviii yeres comyng cryste yere worlde sayde v thousande cli appereth cryst incarnate yere worlde account lxx interpreter vmcxcix p thus endeth seconde parte conteyneth iii clxxxiii yeres cassibelan sayde made tributarie romayns yere worlde vmcli reygned yeres vii ca l fo xviii temancius tenancius brother cassibelan brytaynes ordeyned kyng yere worlde v thousande c lvii reygned yeres xxiii ca lii folio xviii kymbelinus sonne thena cius made kyng brytos yere world vmclxxx reygned yeres xxxv wryters agre reygnyng thys kyng oure sauyour iesus christ incarnat began vi age ca liii folio xviii tyme thys kynge kymbelyus reygn dyuers auctours trete darkly fewe nat accout yeres tyme hys reygne excepte peter pictauiensis auctours englysshe boke whych afferme hym reygne xi yeres galfrido monmouth sayth whanne reygned yeres begate ii sonnes floure hystoryes wytnesseth hym reygne xxxv yeres yt iesus chryst borne xix yere hys reygne whych wyth cronycles tymes dothe somwhat better agre guiderius sonne kymbalyne made kynge brytayne yere lordes incarnacyo xvi yere worlde vmiicxvii reygned yeres xxviii ca liiii fo xix aruiragus brother guiderius began reygne ouer brytons yere lordes incarnacyon xliiii reygned yeres xxx thys tyme glouceter buylded claudius xxvi yere thys kynges reygne whych lxx yere incarnacyo lorde began fyrst persecucio chrysten men vnder nero ca lv fo xix marius whyche englysshe cronycle nameth westmere sonne aruiragus made kyng brytayne yere lorde lxxiiii yere worlde reygned yeres ii chester towne thys kyng founded westmerlande also thys kynge toke hys name xxi yere kynges reygne second persecucyon vnder domicianus also thyrd persecucyon xxxv yere thys kynge vnder tratanus ca lvii fo xx coilus sonn marius made kyng brytayne yere lorde c xxvi yere fyrste adam reygned yeres liii ye xlv yere thys coilus fourthe persecucyon vnder marcus antonius amelius ca lviii fo xxii lucius sonne coilus bega hys reygne ouer brytons yere oure lorde clxxx worlde reygned yeres xii thys fyrste chrysten kyng brytayne image cryst north dore church poulys founde ryuer thames thys lucius authoure sayeth founden ye xiiii yere coilus yere worlde cxl ca lix folio xxii thys lucius auctours dout fully treate galfride sayth lucius dyed yere lorde clvi guido de calupna sayth lucius cristened fore sayd yere peter pictauiensis sayth lucius began reygne yere lorde clxxx receyued fayth viii yere reygn floure historyes sayth reygned xii yeres fayth hym receyued furthermore shewed certeyne table hangyng north parte quyre poules londont hat sayd lucius crowned kyng brytayne yere grace cxxiii reygned lxxvii yeres englyshe cronycle agreeth therwith hys coronacion sayth reygned xii yeres appereth great dyscord betwene wryters agreen sayd lucius conuerted ye fayth tyme pope eleutherius concordance many storyes made pope yere lord clxxviii wherfore galfrides sayng denayd sayth died yere grace clvi also sayeng guydo receyuyng ye fayth rather oughte gyue credence foresayde table peter pictauiensis affermeth ye sayd lucius reygne xii yere wryters wrote actes reygnes kynges haue ouerskypt semeth tyme whyche lucius reygned receyued fayth reygned receyued fayth xx yeres yt receyued faythe hys xx yere reygned xv yeres haue accouted xv yere whyche reygned crysten kynge haue lette passe xx yere thought forsayd auctour peter pictauiens dyd whych reason beynge alowed sayde table maye agre wyth sayd peter wythoute greate dyfference whyche testyfyeth ye sayd lucius reygne lxxvii yere kynge whose deth moche dyed wythout lawfull heyre great contecion sprange amonge brytons endured xv yeres shall apere sequel trouth history seuerus romayne succeded lucius brytayne ye tyme nat certaynly sette whan sayd seuerus subdued brytos therfore noted whanne shewed romaynes sedicion discorde brytos sleyng romayns beyng brytayn senate sentte thyder forsayd seuerus wyth ii legion men whych bare selfe manfully shorte whyle compelled brytons obey senate whyche policronicon affermeth yere lord cxcv whyche yere hath iacobus philippus sayde seuerus began raygne ouer romayns dysagreeth cronycles eutropius matheolus forsayde iacobus philippus sayth whan sayde seuerus subdued arabyes parthys gallys many battayls came brytayn beynge troubled wyth dyuers chaunces laste died ye towne yorke supposed ye ende hys reygn came hether xii yere hys reygne ouer romayns yere lorde iicvii reygned ouer brytons v yere wherefore euydetly apereth forsayd dyscord dured xv yeres whych tyme brytayne wythoute kynge thus endeth thyrde parte conteyneth cclvi yeres seuerus emperour rome shewed xii yere hys empyre yere oure lord iic vii beganne hys reygne ouer brytos yere ye world reygned kynge yeres v fyrst persecucyon chrysten men vnder seuerus yere lord iicx ca lxi fo xxii bassianus sonn seuerus began hys reygne ouer brytons yere lorde iicxii yere worlde reygned yeres vi ca lxii folio xxii carassius yonge lusty brytayne vnknowe blode meanes hys story sheweth began hys domynyon ouer brytons yere lorde iic xviii yere worlde ruled yeres viii ca lxiii fo xxiii agayn authours forget ye yeres kynges folowyng whyche nat greatly maruyll thys tyme muche discencyon among romayne prynces also amonge brytons cyuyll warre ceased nat styrred wyth dyscencyon warre yt none coulde occupy kyngedome determynate tyme whyche cause suche lyke authours coude nat assyne certeyne tyme prynces semeth maye come knowlege policronicon sheweth constantius yt father constantine great sente senate brytayne yere lord iiclxxix seconde yere probrus emperour shuld subdue ye romayns coelus kyng whych tyme coming sayde constantius vntyll last yere bassianus accountynge bakwarde passed lxi yeres tyme whych yeres reygned thys ilelande iiii kynges say carassius alectus asclepiodotus coelus allectus duke senatour rome began hys domynyon ouer brytons yere oure lorde iicxxvi worlde reygned yeres vi ca lxiiii fo xxiii asclepeodotus englysshe boke asclepades began hys reygne ouer brytons yere lorde god ccxxxii yere worlde reygned yeres xxx syxt persecucyon crysten men yere lorde ccxxxviii vnder maximian vii persecucyon ye yere oure lorde cclv vnder decius ye whych pope fabyan martyred viii persecucion yere lord cclx vnder ualeryan whych xviii yere thys asclepiodotus ca lxv folio xxiiiii coelus coyll erle colchester exytyng brytos made kyng brytayne yere oure lord cclxii reygned yeres xxvii thys kyng wryters made towne colchester essex ca lxvi fo xxiiii constancius senatoure rome reason maryage knyt wyth eleyn doughter coelus beganne reygne kyng brytayne ye yere lord cclxxxix ye worlde reygned yeres xxx ix persecucyon cryste men vnder aurelianus saint albon prothomartyr tyme thys constancius haue ye x persecucyo whych vnder dioclesian maximian martyred ca lxvii fo xxiiii constancius surnamed great sonn constancius holy heleyne began reygne ouer brytayne yere oure lorde iiicxix worlde reygned kyng yeres x ca lxviii folio xxv octauius duke y iewesses named westsaxos extorte power began hys reygne ouer brytons yere oure lorde iiic xxix worlde reygned yeres liiii ca lxxi fo xxvii thys kynge folowynge called maximius maximianus wryters dyuersly speke say raygned yeres concordaunce cronycles playnly apereth sayd maximis began reygn ouer brytos yere lord iiiclxxxii slayn theodosius elder thyrd yere reygne whych began reygne yere lord iiiclxxxviii appereth playnly reygned ix yeres maximius maximianus son leonyne brother trahern vncle helcyne began hys reygne ouer brytayn yere lord iiiclxxxii reygned yeres ix ca lxxii fo xxvii saynt ursula wyth felowes thys kynges tyme martyred enanus melga gracianus offycer feede knyght maximius began oppresse brytons yere lorde iiicxc tyrannysed yeres iiii ca lxxiiii fo xxviii storyes agre gracian slayne brytayne vexed longe whyle wyth ofte dysce sion cyuyll warre longe thys dyscord dyd last authours trete diuersly say lasted l yere xl xxx therfore know ye certeynty requisite dylygently serche howe many yeres passed fro last yere gracia vntyll begynnynge reygne constantyne certayn tyme whan constatyne made kyng witnesseth guydo crowned cicester yere lord iiiicxxxv floure hystoryes sayth also thyrde yere theodocius yonger emperour constantyne began rule brytons whych theodocius begane reygne yere lorde iiiicxxxi wherby apereth last yere gracia vntyll begynnyng constantyne passed xl yeres trewrule yt yere grace iiiicli saxon fyrst perced brytayne thyrd yere uortigern whych takyng awaye reygne uortigern ii yeres fro reygn constacius v yere fro reygn constatyne x yere foloweth yt sayd dyssencion mysery brytons lasted xxxix yeres full ended trybute payd romayns endured aboue iiiiclx yeres thus endeth fourth parte encludeth ccxxv yeres p line kynges fraunce pharamundus son mercomirus began hys reygne fyrst kyng fraunce yere lord iiiicxx mysery brytons xxvi yere reygned yeres xi ca lxxviii folio xxxi clodius clodio crynitus capillatus sonne pharamude ordeyned seconde kyng fraunce yere lord iiii hundreth xxxi xxxvii yere myserye brytons reygned yeres xix capi lxxix folio xxxi begynneth fyfthe parte constantinus brother aldroenus kyng lytell brytayne beganne hys reygn ouer moche brytayne anno domini iiii hundreth xxxiii yere clodio kynge fraunce thyrd yere reygned yeres x capi lxxx folio xxxii constantinus sonne constantyne tyme monke made kynge moche brytayne yere oure lorde iiii hundreth xliii xiii yere clodio kynge fraunce reygned yeres v ca lxxxi folio xxxii uortigerus uortigernus duke cornewayll consull y treason made kynge yere lorde foure hundreth lxviii xviii yere clodio kynge fraunce reyned yeres xvii saxon englysshemen thyrde yere kynges reygne fyrste entred thys ilande capi lxxxii folio xxxii meroneus neuewe next allye vnto clodio made kynge frenchemen yere lorde iiii hundreth l seconde yere uortiger kynge brytayne reygned yeres x capi lxxxv folio xxxiiii meroneus neuewe next allye vnto clodio made kynge frenchemen yere lorde iiiic l seconde yere uortiger kyng brytayne reygned yeres x ca lxxxv fo xxxiiii chyldericus hylderycus sonne meroneus ordeyned kyng fraunce yere oure lorde iiiic lx xii yere uortiger kyng brytayne reygned yeres xxiiii ca lxxxvi folio xxxv uortimerus sonn uortiger made kyng brytayne yere lorde iiiiclxxxiiii iiii yere chylderych kyng fraunce reygned yeres vii ca lxxxviii fo xxxvi uortigernus named agayne restored kyngdome yere lord iiiiclxxi ye xi yere chylderyche kyng fraunce reygned yeres ix thys kynges tyme aboute yere lorde iiiiclxxvi kyngdome kent fyrste kyngdome saxos began vnder hengystas appereth fo xxxvii ca lxxxix folio xxxvi aurelius ambrosius seconde sonne constantyne brother constancius monke slayne reason uortiger made kyng brytayne yere oure lorde iiiiclxxxi xi yere chylderych kyng frauce reygned yeres xix thys kynges tyme yere lorde iiiiclxxxii beganne kyngedome southsaxones vnder ella hys sonnes also thys kynges tyme saye yere lorde iiiiclxxxxii begane kingdome estangles vnder u fa guydo sayeth beganne yere oure lorde v hundreth lxx appereth capi xciiii fo xxxviii clodoueus sonne chyldericus hyldericus named ordeyned kynge fraunce yere oure lorde iiii hundreth lxxxiiii thyrde yere aurelius thanne kynge brytayne reygned yeres xxx thys fyrste crysten kynge whyche receyued fayth saynt remygius aboute yere oure lorde iiii hundreth xcix whereby appereth fayth came brytayne aboue iii hundreth yere came fraunce capi xcvii fo xxxix uter surnamed pendragon yongest sonne constantyne brother aurelius made kyng brytayne yere lorde vc xvi yere clodoueus tha kyng fraunce reygned yeres xvi ca c fo xli clotharius lotharius son clodoueus beganne hys reygne ouer frenchemen yere lorde vc xiiii yere uter kyng brytayne reygned yeres l ca ci fo xlii arthurus son uter begane hys rygne ouer brytos ye yere lorde vc xvii iii yere lotharius thanne kynge fraunce reygned yeres xxvi thys kynges tyme kyngdom saxos bega vnder serdicus yere lord vcxxiii ca ciiii fo xliiii constantius sonne cador began hys reygne ouer lande brytayne yere lorde v c xliii xxix yere lotharius kynge fraunce reygned yeres iii totila kyng ostragathoris time spoyled rome cytyes italy ca cvii folio xlv aurelius conanus neuewe costantyne bega hys reygne ouer brytayne yere lorde vc xlvi ye xxxii yere lotharius forenamed reygned yeres ii thys kynges tyme kyngdome northumbers began vnder ida yere lord vcxivii ca cviii fo xlvi uortiporius son aurelius conanus began rule brytos yere lord vc xlviii yere clothare kyng frauce xxxiiii reygned yeres iiii ca cx fo xlvii malgo brother uortiporius bega hys reygne ouer brytons yere lord vc lii xxxviii yere lothayre fornamed reygned yeres moste accorde wryters xxxv ca cxi folio xlvii chilpericus iii sonn clotharius began hys reygne ouer frenchme yere lorde vc lxiiii xiiii yere malx tha kyng brytayne reygned yeres xiiii ca cxii fo xlvii careticus bryton vncowthe byrth began hys tyrany ouer brytons yere lord vclxxx vi xxii yere chylperyche kyng frauce tyrannysed yeres iii ca cxviii fo liii noted ye sayd careticus expulsed brytayne brytos abode cambria partes fought oftewith saxos whose captaynes fro thys careticus vntyll cadwan story remebreth none yet ye cocordauce cronycles hystories apereth yt betwene laste yere careticus begynnyng reygn cadwan passed xxiii yeres apereth ye sequell furthermore tyme ethelbert king kent receyued fayth yere oure lorde vcxcvi thys ethelbert bylded poules church yere lord vicxiii began kyngdome estsaxons vnder sebertus lotharius clotharius ye son chylpericus bega hys reygne ouer frechme yere lord v clxxxviii ii yere careticus kynge brytayne reygned yeres xliii ca cxxii fo lvi cadwanus duke northwalis ye brytons chosen kyng bega reygne ouer parte brytos yere lorde vic viii xxv yere secode clothayre reygned yeres xxii kynges tyme kyng done mercia began vnder penda ca cxxviii folio lxiiii dagobertus ye fyrst ye name sonn ye secod clothayre bega hys dominio ouer ye frecheme yere lord vic xxxi ye viii yere cadwan kyng brytayne reygned yeres xiiii saynt denys hys felowes foud king myracle ca cxxxi fo lxv cadwallus son cadwan began hys reygne ouer parte brytayne yere lorde vic xxxv iiii yere fyrste dagoberte kynge frauce reygned yeres xlviii ca cxxxiii folio lxvii elodoueus yoger sonn dagobertus bega hys reygne ouer frenchme yere lord vic xlv x yere cadwall kyng brytayn reygned yeres xvi ca cxxxvi fo lxxi clotharius ye thyrde name sonne clodoueus made kyng frauce ye yere lord viclxii xxvi yere cadwall kyng brytayne reygned yeres iiii ca xxxvii fo lxxii theodoricus brother ye fornamed lothayre began hys reygne ouer frauce yere lorde viclxvi xxx yere fore sayd cadwall kynge brytayne reygned yeres iii ca cxxxviii fo lxxii chylderycus hylderycus ye iii sonne clodoueus began reygne ouer frenchman yere lord viclxix ye xxxiii cadwall yet kyng brytayne reygned yeres ii ca cxxxix fo lxxii cadwaladrus bede cedwalla sonne cadwallo began rule brytos yere oure lorde viclxxx iii xii yere theodoricus tha kyng frauce reygned yeres iii ca cxl folio lxxiii tyme raygne cadwalader autours write diuersly shew ii seuerall persones galfryde say whan reygned xii yeres went rome thereof pope sergius made monk dyed yere lord viclxxix sayeng differeth farre authours guido de caluma sayeth hys worke shortly gathered kynges brytayne whan cadwallader also named cadwalla sonne cadwallon peassably gouerned brytayne iii yeres went rome pope sergius made monk ended hys lyfe yere lord viclxxxix whych sayng policronicon hys v boke xx chapyter affermeth nameth sayd cadwalader king brytons westsaxos kyng iew iue hys successour authours policronico alledgeth hym beda whych name thys cadwalader ced walla apereth one person thys tyme reygned ouer brytons westsaxones whyche last kyng stok brytons kynges westsa proces tyme subdued kinges therfore wyll obserue order vntyll haue broughte thys ilande one monarchy endeth lyne kynges brytayne whyche contynued fro fyrst brute mviiic xxii yeres thus endeth fyft parte whyche includeth ccliii iewe iue ye blod saxon som writer iuo beganne hys reygne ouer westsaxones rekyn departing cadwalader yere oure lorde vi hundreth lxxx vii xvi yere seconde theodoricus thanne kynge fraunce reygned yered xxxvii ca cxli folio lxxvi clodoueus iii name secod sonne second theodoricus made kyng frauce ye yere lord vicxc iii yere iewe tha kyng westsaxones reygned yeres iii ca cxlii folio lxxvi chyldebertus second sonn theodoryche bega hys reygne ouer frecheme ye yere lord vi clxxx xiii vi yere iue yet kyng westsaxones reygned yeres xvii ca cxliii fo lxxvi dagabertus ye secod ye name sonne chyldeberte auctorysed kyng frechme ye yere lord viic x xxiii yere iewe yet kyng westsaxones reygned yeres xi ca cxliiii fo lxxvi daniell yt named chylperyk clerke made kyng frenche men yere lorde viic xxi xxiiii yere iewe yet king westsaxons reygned yeres v ca cxlv fo lxxvi ethelardus neuewe iewe bega reygne ouer ye westsaxos yere lord viic xxiiii thyrde yere daniell king fraunce reygned yeres v ca cxlvi fo lxxvii theodoricus secod ye name sonne seconde dagobert began hys reygne ouer frenchman yere lord viic xxvi seconde yere ethelardus king westsaxones reygned yeres xiiii ca cxlvii fo lxxvii cutbertus ye neuewe ethelard began reygne ouer westsaxos yere lord viic xxix thyrd yere secod theodoricus reygned yeres xvi ca cxlviii fo lxxix hyldericus chyldericus seconde ye name sonne theodoricus made kyng frenchme yere lord viic xl xi yere cutbert kyng westsaxons reygned yeres x endeth lyne meroneus begynneth lyne pepyn ca cxlix folio lxxix sygebertus neuewe cutbert began hys reygne ouer westsaxos yere lord viic xlv v yere hyldericus second kyng frauce reygned yeres ii ca cl fo lxxx kenulphus blode lyne cerdicus bega hys reygne ouer westsaxos yere lord viic xlviii ye vii yere hyldericus tha king frauce reygned yeres xxxi ca cli fo lxxxi pipinus secod sonne charles martellus fyrst made king frauce ye blode ye yere lord viic l second yere kenulphus tha kyng westsaxos reygned yeres xviii ca cliii fo lxxxi carolomanus wyth charlys surnamed ye great sonnes pepyn began reygne ouer frauce ye yere lord vclxviii xx yere kenulphus reygned yeres ioyntly charles alone xlvii charles ye fyrst emperour romayns stok frech men reygned xiiii yeres ca cliiii fo lxxxiii brightricus forenamed blod cerdicus made kyng westsaxons yere lord viiclxxvii ye x yere charles king frauce reygned yeres xvii ix yere thys kynge dane fyrste entred ile playnly apereth ye story folowyng ca clvii fo lxxxvi egbertus englysshe boke edbryght son alumundus bega hys reygne ouer westsaxos ye yere lord viiclxxx xv xxvii yere charles kyng frauce reygned yeres xxxviii thys kyng comaunded saxos anglys brytayn named anglia englad ca clviii fo lxxxvi lodouicus fyrste ye name sonne charles great beganne reygne emperour kyng frauce yere lord viiic xv ye xx yere egbertus tha kyng westsaxons reygned yeres xxvi ca clix fo lxxxvii adeulphus ethelwolphus sonne egbertus began hys reygn ouer westsaxos yere lord viiic xxxii xvi yere lowys fyrst kyng frauce reygned yeres xxii ca clxii fo xci charles second name yongest sonne fyrste lowys surnamed balled beganne reygn ouer west parte fraunce yere lord viiic xli ix yere adeulphus reygned yeres xxxviii countre flaunders thys charles dayes began fyrste bere name ende hys story shewed ca clxiii fo xcii ethelwaldus eldest sonne adeulphus began hys reygne ouer westsaxos yere ord viiic lv x yere charles balled kyng frauce reygned one yere ca clxvii folio xcvi ethelbertus seconde sonne adeulphus auctorysed kynge westsaxos yere lorde viiic lvi xi yere charles ballyd yet kyng fraunce reygned yeres vi tyme thys kynges reygne vii iohan whyche woma admitted pope aboute yere oure lorde viiiclviii sayth iacobus phylyppus ca clxviii fo xcvi etheldredus thyrde sonne adeulphus made kyng westsaxons wyth yere lorde viiic lxiii xviii yere charles forenamed yet kynge frauce reygned yeres viii tyme thys kynges reygne saynte edmond kynge eest angle martyred princys danu martyrus ca clxix fo xcvi aluredus alphredus iiii sonne adeulphus ye yere lorde viiiclxxii began hys reygne ouer westsaxos xxxi yere charles forenamed yet kynge frauce reygned yeres xxviii ca clxxi fo xcviii lowys balbus secod name sonne chales balled began hys reygne ouer frenchemen ye yere grace viiiclxviii vi yere alerude tha kyng westsaxons reygned yeres ii ca clxxiiii fo ci lowys charles sonnes lowys balbus beganne reygne ioyntly ouer ye frenchme yere lord viiic lxxx viii yere alurede kyng westsaxons reygned yeres v ca lxxv folio cii lowys iiii ye name sonne charles last remebred began hys reygn ouer frauce ye yere grace viiiclxxx vi xiiii yere aluredus yet kyng westsaxons reygned yeres viii ca lxxvii fo ciiii eudo oddo son robert erle angeowe began hys reygne ouer frechmen yere lord viiiclxxx xv xxiii yere aluredus yet kyng westsaxons reygned yeres ix ca lxxviii folio ciiii edwarde surnamed elder sonne alurede alphrede began hys reygne ouer part englande yere lorde ixc one vi yere eudo kynge fraunce reygned yeres xxiiii ca clxxix fo ciiii charles surnamed simple sonn iiii lowys beganen hys reygne ouer realme frauce yere lorde ixciiii ye iii yere edward kynge englande reygned yeres xxiiii ca clxxxi fo cvi radulphus sonne rychard duke burgoyne began reygn ouer frauce yere lorde ixc xxii xxi yere edward yet kyng englande reygned yeres xii ca lxxxiii fo cviii ethelstanus sonn edward elder bega hys reygne ouer partye england ye yere lord ixc xxv thyrde yere rauffe tha kyng frauce reygned yeres xvi thys kyng broughte brytayne englade one monarchy yet wryters alurede dyd ca clxxxiiii fo cviii lowys v name sonne charles symple bega hys reygne ouer frauce yere lord ixc xxxiiii ye ix yere ethelstane tha kyng englad reygned yeres xxi ca clxxxvi fo cx edmoud brother ethelstane sonne edward elder began hys reygne ouer englad yere lord ixc xli vii yere ye v lowys kyng frauce reygned yeres vi ca clxxxviii folio cxiii edredus brother edmoud bega reygne ouer englad yere lorde ix xlvii ye xiii yere ye forenamed lowys yet king frauce reygned yeres ix ca clxxxix fo cxiiii lotharius eldest sonn ye v lowis anoited king frauce yere lord ixc xl viii yere edwardus tha kynge englad reygned yeres moste wryters xxxix ca cxc fo cxiiii edwynus ye eldest son edmoud brother ethelstane enoynted kyng englade yere oure lord ixclvi secod yere lothayre tha kyng frauce reygned yeres iii ca cxcii fo cxvi edgarus secod sonn edmoud brother edwyn bega reygne ouer englad yere grace ixc lx ye v yere lotharius kyng frauce reygned yeres xvi ca cxciii fo cxvi edward son edgare surnamed martyr bega hys reygne ouer ile englad yere lorde ixclxxvii xxii yere lothayre yet kyng frauce reygned yeres iiii ca cxcvi fo cxix egelredus ye sonn also edgare made kyng englad ye yere grace ixclxxx one xxvi yere lothayre yet king frauce reygned yeres xxxvi ca xcvii folio cxx lowys ye vi ye name sonne lothayr bega reygn ouer frauc ye yere lord ixclxxxvi v yere egelbertus tha king england reygned yeres iii thys kyng endeth lyne pepyn ca cci fo cxxiiii hugt capet ye sonn roberte ye tyraut descended hugh le graude bega take vppo hym vsurpe crowne frauce yere oure lord ixc ix ye ix yere egelrede ruled yeres ix ca ccii folio cxxvi robert sonn hughe began reygne ouer frechme ye yere lord ixclxxx xviii yere egelredus kyng englad reygned yeres xxx ca cciii folio cxxvii edmoude ironsyde sonne egelredus also canutus ye son swanus bega reygn ouer englade yere lord xvii ye xix yere robert tha kinge frauce reygned one yere ca cciiii fo cxxvii kanutus ye englysh boke named knougth bega deth edmoud reygn alone ouer englad yere grace xix xx yere robert tha kyng frauce reygned yeres xix ca ccv fo cxxviii hery sonn robert bega hys domynyo ouer frauce yere lord xxix x yere canutus tha king englad reygned yeres xxxi ca ccvii fo cxxx harolde surnamed harefote ye son canutus began reygne ouer england yere lorde xxxix x yere henry tha kyng frauce ruled yeres iii ca ccviii fo cxxxi hardikynitus hardiknought ye son canutus emma made king englade yere lord xli xii yere ry tha kyng frauce reygned yeres ii kyng ended line dane cotynued thys lade great persecucio aboue iicl yeres ca ccix fo cxxxii edward holy cofessour son egelredus emma laste wyfe bega hys reygn ouer realm englad yere oure lorde xliii iiii yere henry tha kyng frauce reygned vertue holynes yeres xxiiii kynges tyme chapell walsynghm fyrst bylded ye yere lord mlxi ca ccx fo cxxxiii philippe fyrst ye name son hery bega gouerne ye frech yere lord mlxviii xvi yere edward confessour tha kynge englande reygned yeres xlviii godfrey bulyo nat boleyn philippes tyme gat stregth citie hierusale crowned king ye yere lord mxcix ca ccxv fo cxxxviii harolde ye eldest son erle goodwyn bega reygn ouer englyshme yere lord mlxvi ye viii yere philippe kynge fraunce reygned yeres ix ca ccxvi fo cxxxviii thus endeth vi parte conteyneth iiiclxxxi yeres willyam duke normady bastarde sonne robert vi duke sayd prouynce bega hys reygne ouer realme englande xv day octobre yere lord mlxvii ye ix yere ye fyrst philipe yet kyng frauce reygned yere vpo xxii xx yere thys kyng church saint poule wyth great parte lodon burned thys kyns fouded monasteryes batell barmu desey ca ccxix fo cxlii wyllyam surnamed rede sonne wyllyam coquerour began hys reygne ouer englad moneth iuly yere lord mlxxx ix xxxi yere philippe forenamed yet king frauce reygned yeres xii ca ccxxiii fo cxlvii henry surnamed beawclerke thyrd son wyllyam conqueroure bega hys reygne ouer englad yere lord mc one xliii yere foresayd phylyp yet kyng frauce reygned yeres xxxv ca ccxxvi fo cl lowys surnamed greate sonn ye fyrst philippe enoynted king frauce ye yere lord mc vii ye vi yere first henry kynge fraunce reygned yeres xxix capi ccxxx folio clv stephan erle boloyng sonn vnto erle blesens wyues syster hery fyrst bega hys reygne ouer englade yere grace mc xxxvi last yere lowys great reygned yeres xix ca ccxxxii fo clvii lowys viii ye name son lowys great bega reygne ouer fraunce yere lord mcxxxvi fyrste yere stephan kyng england reygned yeres xliii ca ccxxxiiii folio clx henry seconde name sonne geffrey plantaginet molde emperesse bega hys reygn englande yere lorde mc lv xix yere lowys viii kyng fraunce reygned yeres xxxv saynt edwarde confessour traslated ix yere thys kyng xvi yere hys reygne sait thomas caunterbury martyred cap ccxxxvi folio clxii philippe second name surnamed deu done sonne viii lowys beganne hys reygne fraunce yere lord thousande c lxxix xxiiii yere henry seconde kyng englande reygned yeres xliii ca ccxli fo clxviii thus endeth table fyrste volume accomptynge yeres worlde creacyon adam vnto incarnacyon criste ben many sondery opynyons hebrewes whych accompt sayde terme iii thousande ix hundred lxiii yeres seuenty interpretours reken vmclxxx xix yeres reken vmlxxx xix yeres v thousande cc xxviii yeres thyrde boke fyrste chapyter polycronycon ben also shewed dyuers opinyons wherof gretest nomber certayne v thousande cc yeres place also reke mo haue lesse reason wherof tymes ben diuersly sette accompted fyrst foudacyon rome subuersyon famouse cytye troye fyrst buyldynge cytye london dyuerse old thinges se yt accopt ye seuenty interptours holy beda many holy wryters allowed folowyd therfore ente dynge shew rude worke folowyng yere ye world brute entred fyrste thys ile called albyon england purpose kepe sayde accompte wherof partyculers ensewe wyt fyrste adam noeflowyd xxii hundred xlii yeres noe abraham flowed ix hundred xlii yeres abraha dauid flowyd ix hundred xl yeres dauid captyuyte iewys passed iiii hundred lxxx v yeres captyuyte comynge christe v hundred lxxx tenne yeres whyche make v thousande hundred lxxx xix yeres accopt moste accordynge purpose thys worke yt dyuerse opynyons thereof ben left writyng dyuerse autours famous cytye troye subuerted ye grekes wytnessyth holy eusebius yere ye world iiiim xxiii also folowyng sayd accompt wytnessyth forsayde euseby dyuerse cyte rome begon buylded xi yere ezechias kynge iuda whyche yere maketh sayde auctours yere worlde iiii thousande foure hundred lxx ye sayd auctours afferme sayd cytye rome edifyed subuersion troye iiii hudred xlvii yeres whych reason must folowe buylded yere world y aboue sayde peter pictauiensis testifye brute entred fyrste ile albyon called englande xviii yere preste iudge israel named hely myth dyuers auctours sayde hely beganne rule israelite yere thyrde age abraham dauid viii hudred lxi whych maketh yeres ye worlde foure thousande xlv wherunto yf ioyned aboue sayd xviii yeres muste yt folow brute shuld entre lande yere worlde foure thousand lxiii agreeth ye auctour polycronicon whych sayth brute entred albion xl yeres subuersyon troye whych xl yeres ioyned former sayeng eusebius maketh ye sayd nomber iiii thousande lxiii yeres also wryter hystoryes called iacobus philippus affermeth troye taken grekes thyrde yere yt abdon labdon iudged israelytes whych began rule ouer sayde israelytes accorde moste wryters yere worlde iiii thousande xx wherunto yf ioyned thre yeres ye third yere rule whyche yere troye y sayde taken xl yeres passed brute percyd albyon yt muste folowe ye brute entred fyrst thys ile albyon sayd yere world iiii thousand lxiii foresayd reason brute toke possession ile albyon yere worlde sayde buyldyng cytye rome foresayd reason may also prouyd iiii hundred vii yeres incarnacyon blessyd sauyour folowynge accompte thousande hundred xxx vi yeres pthus endeth thaccomptynge yeres worlde creacyon adam vnto incarnacyon chryste prologe whan aduertyse remembraunce manyfolde storyes order duely sette kyng prince ye whilom gouernauce rome italye fette iewes grekes whyche haue let men may se order seryously longe reygned successyuely fraunce myght lykewyse reporte theyr great honour doth appere englande yf shall resorte ryght mysty storyes doutfull vnclere name tymes duraunt yere kynges prynces ruled famouse yle almoste vncertayne shuld guyde style cunnynge full destytute brynge frame great mystery nyll presume wythout refute ioyne suche worke yt rectyfye yt semyth farre sette awrye tyme yeres dyscordaunt dull wytte yt atteynaunt brynge order thynge suche weyght cause yt agre wyth olde storyes yt remytte ben sleyght sharpe lecture haue kepte theyr studyes sought bokes many olde hystoryes haue cronycles full experyence frame suche worke theyr great prudence lyke ye pretyse hewyth rough stone bryngeth yt square wyth hard stroke many mayster may ouergone prynte therin fygures storye worke yt proporcynary yt may appere shall yt se thynge ryght perfyte well eche degre haue sette rude warke rough stone comen square lerned studyed clerke may yt ouer polyshe clene yt pare flowryshe yt wyth eloquence wherof yt bare frame yt order yet ioynt olde authours may gree euery poynt besechynge hym wyll take payne lyste loke errour hym sayne correcte mende rude boke hym neuer yet order toke gre scole sought great cunnynge worke gaderyd wyth small vnderstandynge pompe yet great mede worke haue taken hande compyle onely bycause wolde sprede famouse honour fertyle yle hath contynued many longe whyle excellent honour wyth many royall guyde dedes haue sprong world wyde dedes lyste shewe sequele shall well appere shorte processe wordes fewe goodly may shall lynke fere storyes englande fraunce dere reader yt may well say e kynges gyder ruled landes twayne pryncypyll reygne euery kyng well one lesse yere worlde toke begynnynge guyde realme farther besynesse wyll eke take shewe expresse terme yeres euery prynce dyd reygne honour dyd tyme maynteyne tyme also longe brytons ruled saxon lastely put oute dane whyche landes defoyled theyr outrage theyr fury stoute nacyons stode longe great doute tyll fraunce wyth allyed maryage englande lastely voyded lynage normayns wyllya coquerour entrede lande helde seygnory certayne tyme tyll hygh gouernour restored blode saxon enterly scottes neuer coude apply kepe theyr allegeaunce many tyme rebelled true full often compelled fatall warre hath dured longe twene frauce englande theyr damage peace hath ben vnderfonge great othes eke maryage walys geryshenesse theyr lyght dotage scourged theyr vnstedfastnesse wyth dyuers whyche shall expresse london auncyent cytye hath euer perseueryd vertuous noblesse great honour may consydred lande welth great largesse therfore thynke somwhat expresse theyr good order cyuyle polycy longe haue ruled theyr cytye theyr ruler yerely chosen rule comonte theyr dyscrecyon shall shewe dysclosen name mayres shyryffes towne suche actes reuolucyone theyr dayes fyll shall appere prynces actes whyche chaunged yere yere fraunce also cronycle shall ensew dewe order ye may knowe beganne theyr prynces renewe seruage kept lowe romayns dyd ouerthrowe theyr name whylom dyd chaunge theyr fyrst baptysme theyr name strauge thus boke maye se bothe landes cronycles entyere wyth mater whyche regystred olde wryters suche wrote full clere actes prynces done farre nere engrosed wyth great dylygence wherby theyr folowers myght growe experyence vii partes haue boke dyuyded reder may chose wyll fyrste conteyneth brytons guyded lande brute moliuncius vntyll moliuncius sette skyll nynthe yere kynge cassibelan seconde parte romaynes conquered brytayne then seueryne thyrde parte haue also assygned fourth endyth constantyne fyfte cadwalader haue also dyffned conquest eke determyned vi parte seuenth laste redoubted prynce haue ende caste henry vii god preserue saue hym defende aduersyte besechynge wyll laboure haue boke rede parte se defaute yt may corrected wythout dysdayne wyll supporte ayde worke wyth theyr comforte boke includeth storyes fele wchyth thynges done sondry place one tyme muste wyth dele kepe yeres tyme space therfore name yt shall purchace concordaunce storyes prouyded auctor sans nome fynally deuysed thys worke may haue better spede prayer thynketh yt ryght necessarye shulde fall consyderynge nede must haue lacke due studye connynge perfyte memory thynges taken yonge hynde ben farre sette putte mynde ignoraunce comen place oblyuyon hath sette hys fote knowlege done race wherby olde auctours myght fynde boot latyn frenche theyr dytees swoot olde wryters haue compendyously sette olde storyes order dylygently prayer thynke nought vsed dyddyn poetys theyr olde dayes whyche made theyr prayer goddes abused iupiter mar theyr olde lawes named goddes fayned theyr sawes goddes batayll rychesse hadde great vertue prowesse may helpe fayned goddes saturne mercury yet bryght apollo bacchus neptune pluto thrall eolus morynos blynde cupido yet goddesse fayre iuno diana pallas cere fre yet musys ben thryes thre wherto shulde call vnto caliope moder orpheus wyth swete armony eloquence hath soueraynte carmentis whyche fyrste studye latyne letter foude perfytly syns mynystres god immortall hadde power dyuynall wherfore lorde celestyall wyll crye hys influence grace mercy wyll droppe lette fall sharpe wytte wyth suche experience may fynyshe wyth assystence wyth fauour virgyn moder moste excellent thus pray wyth mynde hole entent assit principio sanctum maria meo moste blessyd lady comforte suche calle helpe eche necessyte thou aydest may wyse apalle best formyd ylke degre wherfore good lady praye yt may please begynnynge penne lede thyne ayde worke may haue good spede fyrst chapiter syns haue shewed vnto season tyme yeres ye world brute entred fyrste yle albyon semyth yt couenyent also shew cause yt fyrste named albyon whych toke fyrst name wytnessyth strabo writer whyte clyues rockes yt stande vppon see syde farre seen clere wether bryght dayes wherof olde wryters named albyon yt whyte lande whyche sayenge affermyth also ranulphe dyuerse yt may certaynly knowen yt toke fyrste name albyne doughter dioclecyan kyng sirye englyshe cronycle affermyd olde storyes cronycles founde suche kynge name reygned ouer syriens yet assyriens yet suche storye xxx doughters shuld slee theyr xxx husbandes surmysed put writynge whyche yf eny wonder hadde ben wrought shulde haue ben vnremembred wryters auctours partyes consyderynge many lesse wonder put writynge sayde wryters wherfore y apparant yt yt toke fyrst name albyon aboue sayde albyne doughter sayde dioclecyon geautes brute founde yle arryuayll myght brought lade meane shyppes wyse rather borne woman also imagyned yle auctours alpherd beda tell many wonder fyrst boke policronycon suffycietly towched sayd yt yle called worlde sayth solinus edge frenche cliffe shuld ende world yf yland ne many thynges ben specyfyed whyche passe ouer thys yle closyd sydes ye see stretcheth length sowth north hauynge sowthest syde fraunce south ye land spayne north ye coutre norway ye weste coutre irland hath length totnesse catenessey xv myles beyonde mychell stowe cornewayle vpon viii hundred myles reken brede saynte dauyds lande walys called menema douer clyffes coteyneth moste wryters iii hundred myles yf yt rekened ye sayd place walys vnto parmouthe norfolk much lesse lx myles wryters beda saith coteineth ouer cc mile ile fyrste aboue y sayde named albyon secundaryly britayne brute thyrde anglis comaudmet egberte kynge anglys westsaxons yt wryters yt called anglia name quene lande name anglia albe therof founde lytell authoryte ile fyrst coqueryd ye romayns contynued vnto trybutary vnder theyr rule ende story gracianus shall appere ouer iiii hudred yeres secondely saxos thyrdely ye danys fourthly norman deuyded fyrst brute thre partes storie shall appere folowynge ii chapiter brute auncyent noble blode troyans dyscendyd eneas troyan doughter pryame kynge troyans whyche eneas receyued sayde wyfe sonne named ascanius whych kynge countre italye nexte hys father eneas yt foresayde cytye troy sayde grekes subuertyd eneas whyche entendyd haue sauyd dethe fayre polixena doughter kynge pryam dede agamemnon duke chyefe leder grekes exyled fro troy whyche accopanyed wyth great nomber troyans wythin iii yeres departynge troye landed ye coutre italye dyuerse conflyctys bataylles hadde wyth latynus kynge italye maryed agrement sayde latinus hys doughter named lauina uppon ye gatte sonne named hym syluius posthumus whych wryters descendyd brutus fyrste kynge albyon concordaunce worke conuenyencye yeres testyfyeth policronia guydo de coluna wryter storyes ascanius fyrste sonne eneas gotten vppon hys fyrste wyfe hadde sonne named siluius whyche wryters named siluius eneas siluius eneas father brute dyuers opinyons whereof manyfestly shewed xxvii chapyter seconde boke polycronycon yt foloweth ye story brute beyng age xv yeres slewe father shotyng wyld beste authours haue slewe also hys moder tyme byrth laste dede agrement wryters banyshed countre fortune landed wyth conpanye prouynce grece ye tyme reygned kyng named pandrasus wryters pandarus ye whyche kynge affermyth geffrey monmouth lynyally descendyd blode achylles prouynce brute founde many troyans captiuys thrall grekes wyth whyche conspyred faughte wyth ye grekes sondry tymes lastely fynall concorde toke wyfe doughter sayd pandrasus name ignogen whyche maryage solemnysyd sayde brute cousayle ye troyans certayne shyppes well vytaylled departed grece soughte aduenture whyche many daungers passed landed wyth company parte yle affrica named sayth guydo lergesia wythin whyche yle dayes stode old temple dedycate ye honoure diua diana goddesse mysbyleued people whyche temple brute apceyuyd anon yode yt knelyng aulter wyth great deuocyon sayde versys folowynge diua potens nemorum terror syluestribus apris cui licet amfractus ire per aethereos infernas que domos terestria iura resolue et dic quas terras no habitare velis dic certam sedem qua te venerabor aemon qua tibi virgineis templa dicabo choris whyche versys vnderstanden moder tonge expowned celestyall goddesse weldest fryth woode wylde bore bestes thou feryst thy myght guyder shypmen passynge ragyone flode infernall howses erth ryght beholde serche shewe shall fyght tell certayne place euerlastyngly temple virgyne balledyfpe whyche prayer obseruaunces ye pagan ryte great deuocyon done exercysed aboute ye auter ye sayd goddesse idolle day vsed brute fill slepe tyme whyche slepe apperyd hym sayd goddesse sayd hym maner forme foloweth brute sub occasum solis trans gallica regna insula oceano est vnde que clausa mari insula oceano est habitata gigantibus olins nunc deserta quidem gentibus apta tuit hic de prose tua reges nascentur ipsis totius terrae subditus orbis erit hanc pete nan que tibi sedes erit illa perhennis hic fiet natis altera troia tuis whyche versys may englysshed foloweth brute farre wef e ouer l nde fraunce yle occean closed wyth see yle gyautes whilom inhabyt chauce beynge defe e apte thy people th body kynges borne shalbe yle thou shall lorde kynge serche perpetuall see thy childern new city shal spryng iii chapiter brute awoke remebred hym vysyon ano called hym trusted shewed seen harde wherof beynge greatly reioysed caused great fare made whyche cast wyne mylke lycours wyth dyuerse aromate spyces moste swettest odour olde pagan lawes rytes vsed whyche obseruaunce wyth done wyth great ioye myrthe entryd theyr shyppes pulled vp theyr sayles toke theyr course westwarde sayled space xxx dayes passynge many auentures daungers philenes ye lake called lacus salinarum salte lake place salte made ryuer called malea hercules pyllers came lastly see tyrrhen turon encoutred wyth small nauy shyppes whyche troyane neuew brute called corineus captayne whe eyther saluted reioysed theyr metynge gyder made towarde land landyd prouynce gallia called guyan whyche prouynce daye prynce named groffari ruler whyche hauyng knowlege ye landynge straunges wyth power made towarde gaue batayll troyas victours ouercame groffarius wyth knyghtes batayll slayne noble troyane neuewe brute named turonus buryed wherfore remembraunce ye sayd turonus brute buylded cytye named yt turon authours testyfye shuld seme sayenge polycronyca thylke cytye turon buylded afore yt ye authour cronica cronica rum affermyth buylded brute remembrauce sayd cosyn turonus whych citye daye yet great fame wyth realme fraunce done sayde brute co ineus wyth theyr troyans toke agayne shyppynge whyche iii dayes fewe dayes saylyng landyd hauen porte cornewayll named day totnesse then yode serchyng land coutre yere sayd iiii thousande lxiii buyldynge rome folowynge foresayde accompte iiii hundred xx incarnacyon cryste xi hundred xxxvi alexander great conquered worlde eyght hundred xi also kynge reygned ouer frenshe men clere quyte theyr trewage agayne ye romayns xv hundred lvi iiii chapiter retourne brute whyche landyng ile albyon circuyd serchyd ye land ouer foude yt full fertyle plenteous wode grasse garnysshed many fayre ryuers stremes trauaylynge lande encountred wyth many great myghty gyauntes whych destroyed among ye reherseth englyshe cronicle one passyng strength named gogmagog whyche caused wrestle wyth cormeus coryne neuewe besyde douer wrestlinge gyaut brake rybbe syde cormeus thorough corine beyng sore amoued wyth great strength supprysed gyaunt cast hym downe rocke douer reason wherof affermyth ye said englyshe cronicle ye place named fall gogmagog ye name chau ged called fall douer daye enduryth dede brute gaue vnto sayd neuewe corineus coryn hole countre cornewayll whe brute thus destroyed gyauntes serchyd sayde yle albyo thoroughly comyng ye ryuer thamis pleasure ye ryuer also co modytyes therunto adioynynge began buylde cytye ye reme braunce cytye troye lately subuerted named troynouant whyche myche saye newe troy whych name endured tyll comynge lud kynge brytayne vpon tyme thousande lxviii yere ye sayd kyng comaundyd yt called luddys towne shortnesse speche called london whe brute thus buylded cytye saw yt stablysshed realme quyetly thaduise lordes comaunded ye sayd ile coutre called britayn people brytons contynued reygne prosperousely whyche tyme stablysshed ordred people lyue tyllynge theyr lande otherwyse brute receyued wyfe thre sonnes wherof fyrste named locrinus locryne ye seconde cambrius cambre ye third albanactus albanakt fyrst eldest besette yle brytayne whyche named myddell englande whych meane troynouant wyth ye cou tres lyenge coteynynge est west sowth cause yt shuld sounde towarde name sayd locryne parte brytayne longe called loegria logiers seconde sonne cambre beset appoynted hym cou tre walys whyche fyrste named hym cambria eest syde somtyme departed englande ryuer seuerne north syde ryuer named dee chester departeth england walys sowth ryuer called uaga castell strynglyng parteth englande walys thyrde sonne albanakt besette north parte yle named yt albyon veryly sayd countre toke ye name sayd thirde sonne called albania coutre named scotlande deuyded loegria logiers saythe holy beda two army ye see mete eest arme two begynneth ii myles mynster eburcurynge west syde penulton weste arme twayne hath ye ryght syde somtyme hadde stronge cytye named acliud whych ye brettysshe tunge called clynt ton stadeth vppon ryuer called clynt thus whe brute diuided yle brytayne shewed thre partes hadde holden pryncypate therof nobly terme xxiiii yeres cocordauce writer dyed enteryd buryed troynouat london v chapiter locrinus locryne ye fyrst eldest son brute made kynge brytayne ye countre logiers yere worlde iiii thousande lxxx vii whych helde parte sayth policronicon also guydo de columna countre stretcheth south see vnto ryuer humbre expressyd whyle locrinus thus reygned logiers brother albanactus beynge ruler sayd albania scotlande warreyd duke whome cronycle engald nameth humbre ye slewe albanakt playne batayll ye shall vnderstande yt humber daye commynge albania named humber olde wryters called kynge hunnys kyng sithia without addicyon kyng sayde thus subduyd albanactus held lande albania tyll ye locrinus wyth brother cambre gathered gret power men army yode agaynst sayde kynge hunnys strength theyr briton chasyd subduyd sayde hunys sharpely many theyr kyng drowned ryuer departyth england scotland myche wryter storye brytons name declared humber therfore sayde auctor affermyth sayd humber ye ryuer toke fyrste name hym whyche yet contynueth daye furthermore testyfyeth sayde auctour victory thus obteyned two forsayde brotherne locrinus enamowred hym selfe vppon fayre wenche named estrylde doughter forenamed humber kept vnlefully certayne tyme wyth wyfe named guendoloena beynge sore dyscontent excyted fader fredes make warre vppon sayde locryne husbande whyche warre lastly slayne hadde reygned ruled loegria logiers concordaunce moste writer xx yeres buryed fader cytye troynouaunt leuyng hym yonge sonne gotte vppon wyfe named madan vi chapiter guedoloena gue doleyne wyfe locrinus doughter corine duke cornewayle myche madan sonne yonge gouerne lande comune assent ye brytos made ruler yle brytayne yere world iiii thousande hudred vii hauyng possession sayde yle wele dyscretly ruled yt comfort subiectes tyll tyme sonne madan came vnto hys lawfull age whiche season gaue ouer rule domynyon hym ruled y sayde thys yle xv yeres vii chapiter madan sonne locryne gue dolyne named made ruler britayne yere ye world iiii thousande c xxii thys lytell memory made wryters excepte wryte hym vsed great tyranny amonge brytons neuerthelesse te writer agreen ruled ile britayn ye terme xl yeres ye ende terme beynge dysporte huntyng wyld bestes woluys slayne deuouryd left two sonnes sayth policronica named menprecius manli viii chapiter menprecius eldest sonne madan made ruler brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande clxii reygned loge peace yonger broder manlius malycyous couetyse mynde entendynge kynge expell subdue brother excyted briton wyse rebell agayne menprecius ye great dedly warre contynued longe amonge howe yt lastely mediacyons frendes daye communycacyon louynge maner ner attwene two bretherne appoynted whyche daye assemble menprici treason slewe brother manlius whose deth lyued tranquylite rest fyll slowth meane slowth vnlefull lykynge lechery vyce hatered subiectes takynge theyre wyues chylder fynally became vnhappy yt forsoke lefull wyfe concudynes fyll synne sodomye thus one vice grew nother became odyble god man lastely goyng huntynge lost people distroyed wyld bestes reygned xx yeres leuyng hym goodly yonlynge begoten lefull wyfe named ebranke ix chapiter ebranke sonne menprecius made ruler lande brytayne yere worlde foure thousande hundred lxxx ii testyfyeth policronica gaufryde wryters xxi wyues whych receyued xx sonnes xxx doughters wherof fayrest named gwales gualea sent doughters albia siluius whych xi kynge italye vii kynge latynes ende haue maryed blood troyans ebranke also man fayre statute great strengthe power myght enlarged domynyon myche wanne occupyed great parte germania ye ayde helpe latynes retourned thes wyth great pray ryches whych retourne buylded cytye caerbrank called yorke whych shulde sayth authour named flos historiaru floure historyes wryten frenche xxiii yere ye reygne sayd ebranke accompt folow yt shuld seme troynouant lodon buylded sayd cytye yorke hundred xl yeres supposyng cytye london begonne seconde yere brute reygne also buylded albania scotlande castell maydens whych called edynborgh edyfyces ended made wyth great armye sayled gallia nowe fraunce subdued gallis retourned wyth great triumphe rychesse guyded lande brytayne nobly terme lx yeres moste concordaunce wryters dyed buryed caerbrank yorke leuynge hym hys heyre eldest sonne sayth gaufryde named brute greneshyelde x chapiter brute greneshyelde sonne ebranke made gouernour lande brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande ii hudred xlii brute memory made touchynge fame excepte ye gaufryde sayth ruled lande brytayne fader lyuynge certayne tyme fader terme xii yeres whyche yeres expyred endyd dyed lyeth buryed caerbrak yorke leuynge hym sonne named leyll xi chapiter leillus leyr son brute greneshielde made ruler brytayne ye yere ye world iiiimcc liiii iuste louer peace equyte tyme made town caerleyr carlyle ruled lande well honourably terme xxv yeres testyfyeth forenamed gaufryde dyed buryed caerleyr foresayde leyr speketh dele aboue named authour floure historyes sayeng yt ende reygne fyll slowth vnlefull lykyng body meane wherof cyuyle stryfe began grow realme ye pacifyed termes dayes whyche sayenge denyed foresayd authour gaufrid leyll lefte hym sonne named lud wryters named lud hurdibras xii chapiter lud lud hurdibras ye son leyll made ruler lande brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande ii hudred ixxix also gaufryde called hurdibras whyche stablyshed reygne appeasyd drewe accorde dyscorde varyaunce hadde spronge father lyues tyme whych discretely appeasyd endyd buylded towne kaerkyn nowe called caunterbury towne also kaerguen callyd wynton wynchester also towne called mout paladour named septon shaftisbury tyme buyldyng town septon affermyth myne authour gaufride egle spake certayn wordes ye sayth wyll declare wryte certaynte thus sayde lud hadde ruled lande nobly terme xxxix yeres dyed lefte hym sonne named baldud xiii chapiter baldud ye sonne lud hurdibras made gouernoure brytayne yere world iiii thousand iii hundred xviii testyfyed gaufryde polycronica well suffycyently instructe connynges scyeces astronomy nigromancye made hote bathe wythin town caerbadon named bathe whyche towne cytye also buyldyd repugnyth wyllyam de malmesbury saynge foresayd hote bathe made industrye industry iulius cesar fyrste emperour rome baldud affermyth foresayd authour gaufride taught lore nigromacy thorough realme fynally toke yt pryde presumpsyon yt toke vpo fle ye ayer fyll vpon temple god apolyn theron torne ruled brytayne space xx yeres leuynge hym son named leyr xiiii chapiter leyr ye sonne baldud made ruler ouer ye britos yere ye world iiiimccc xxxviii leyr noble codicyos guyded land subiectes great welth made ye towne caerleyr nowe called leyceter leycester yt yt man helde longe pryncypate brytayne yet hym nothynge left worthy memory excepte gaufryde sayth yt receyued wyfe iii doughters onely wythout son whych named gonorilla ragan cordeilla whych mych loued moste specially loued yongest cordeilla name whe leyr leyth wryters fallen competente age knowe mynde thre doughters fyrst asked gonorilla eldeste howe well loued hym whych callyng goddes recorde sayd loued hym owne soule wyth answere father beynge well contented demaunded ragan seconde doughter howe well loued hym answered affermynge wyth great othes sayde coude wyth tong expresse great loue bare hym affermynge furthermore loued hym aboue creature pleasaut answeres two doughters called hym cordeilla ye yongest whych vnderstadyng ye dyssymulacyo ii susters entedyng proue fader sayd reuerent fader ii systers haue dyssymuled wyth pleasaut word fruteles knowyng ye great loue faderly zele toward euer time thou hast borne ye whych may speke otherwyse co scyence ledyth therfore saye father haue loued euer fader shall cotynually whyle lyue loue naturall father yf thou wylt inquisytyfe loue bere ascertayne asmyche thou arte worthy beloued euen myche loue fader wyth answere beynge discotent maryed ii elder doughters one vnto duke cornewayll vnto duke albania scotlande deuyded wyth two maryage lande britayne deth one halfe hand duryng naturall lyfe thyrde cordeilla reserued nothynge fortuned aganippus whych cronycle england named agamp kyng frauce harde ye beaute womahode cordeilla sent vnto fader axyd maryage whome yt answered kynge wold gladly gyue hym doughter dowar wolde departe promysed vnto hys two doughters aganippus thus messagyers enfourmed remembred vertues forenamed cordeilla wythoute promesse dowar maried sayde cordeilla noted yt aganippus agamp called dyuerse cronicles kyng frauce yt agre hystories wyth cronycle fraunce yt testyfyed polycronica peter pictauyece mayster robert gagwyne byshop antonyne many cronicles loge thys daye kynge fraunce longe yt called frauce daye inhabytauntes therof called galli trybutaryes vnto rome wythoute kynge tyll tyme ualentinianus emperour rome hereafter worke shall manyfestly shewed storye briton sayth tyme leyr reygned britayne land fraunce vnder domynyon xii kynges whych aganippus shuld one whyche sayenge full vnlyke trew whych myght prouyd many reason passe ouer length tyme xv chapiter yt foloweth story leyr fallen age forsayde two duke thynkyng longe lordshyp brytayne fallen theyr handes arrose agayne theyr father testifyeth gaufryde beraft hym gouernaunce land vppon certayne codycyons contynued terme lyfe whyche processe tyme minyshyd well maglaunus heninus husbades forenamed gonorild ragan moste dyspleased leyr vnkyndnesse two doughters consyderynge theyr wordes hym spoken sworne founde prouyd contrarye whyche beyng necessyte constrayned fledde lande sayled gallia comforted doughter cordeilla wherof hauyng knowlege naturall kyndnesse coforted hi shewynge maner husbande agrement receyuyd hym lordes courte cherished beste maner longe yt shew vnto ye circumstaunce ye vtterans vnkyndnesse two doughters wordes comfort gyuen hym aganippus cordeilla cousaile purueyauce made sayde aganippus lordes restorynge leyr agayn dominyo fynally helpe sayde aganippus restored agayne lordshyp possessed lyued ruler gouernour therof space iii yeres whych season dyed aganippus leyr ruled lande terme xl yeres affermeth dyuerse cronycles dyed buryed towne caerleir leycestre leuynge hym inheryte lande doughter cordeilla xvi chapiter cordeilla yongeste doughter leyr assente brytons made lady brytayn yere ye world iiii thousande iii hundred lxxxxviii whyche guyded lande full wysely tyme space v yeres complete whyche tyme expyred rone ii neuewes called margan cunedagi sonnes ii susters came vpon land made therin great waste destruccyon laste toke cast stronge pryson beynge dyspayred ye recouery estate testyfyeth gaufryde slewe selfe whenne hadde reygned declared terme fyue yeres xvii chapiter cunedagius marganus neuewes sayde cordeilla departyd lande brytayne betwene yere worlde iiii thousand iiii hundred iii wyt cou trey ouer beyond humber fyll margan towarde catenessey parte lande towarde weste reherseth gaufride fyll cunedagius two yeres ronne ended euyll dysposyd came vnto margan sayde hym yt great reproche dyshonour consyderynge comen gonorilla elder suster maglaunus husbande cunedag descended ragan yonger hemnius husbande ye rule ye land sedycyous son margan gyuynge credence supprysed pryde couetyse anon theyr cou sayle assembled great hoste made warre vpon sayde brother brennynge destroyeng land mercy wherof cunedag beynge ware hast gaderyd people certayne message sent hym reconcylyacyon seynge peace made iudgement batayll mette wyth brother playne felde ye goddes hym fauourable slewe myche people brother copellyd hym fle whyche vyctory thus pursued margan coutre cou tre tyll came wythin countre prouynce cambria walys whyche coutre sayde margan gaue one batayll vnto brother cunedag farre weker ouercomen slayne felde whyche felde coutre sayd margan fought slayne thys daye called glaumargan whych meane vulgare tung margan lande thus margan slayne whan hadde regned wyth brother two yeres xviii chapiter cunedagius named sonne hemnius ragan yoger doughter myddell doughter leyr made ruler lorde brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande iiii hundred v whyche nothyng worthy memorye lefte wrytyng guyded ye lande deth brother well honorably terme xxxiii yeres terme ended dyed buryed troynouant london leuynge heyre sonne testyfyeth gaufryde named riuallo rinallo wryters reyngnolde xix chapiter biuallus sonne cunedagius made gouernoure brytons yere world iiii thousand iiii hundred xxxviii whyche wryters called fortunat restfull riuallus ruled ye brytos great sobernesse kepte lande great welthe prosperyte yt hym lefte specyall memorye acte done tyme except myn authour sayth ye tyme reygne yt reyned blood space iii day contynually wythin lande brytayne whych reyne ensued great excedynge ber multitude flyes people noyous co tagyous slewe myche people sayth olde authour whose name vnknowe ensued great sykenesse mortallytie great desolacyon thys sayde lande yt foloweth story whe riuallus hadde reygned moste cocordaunce writer terme xlvi yeres dyed buryed testyfyeth sayde olde authour caerbrank yorke leuynge hym sonne wytnessyth gaufride named gurgustius tyme reygne thys kynge moste concorde wryters ye famous cytye rome shuld buylded shewed playnly treatyse begynnyng warke xx chapiter gurgustius sonne ye fore named riuallus made ruler brytayne yere worlde iiii thousane iiii hundred lxxxiii ye cronicle englad named gorbodiam sonne reygnold lytell memory made regne dedes authours wryters ye hystorye brytayne excepte aboue named olde authoure authoure called floure hystoryes wytnessyth reygned xxxviii yeres leuynge hym none heyre bodye begotten lastely dyed buryed fader caerbrank yorke rome aboue y towched fyrst buylded edyfyed tyme riuallus moste writer yere worlde iiii thousande iiii hundred lxx buyldyng troynouat london iiii hudred vii yeres whych folowyng accompte shulde xxxii yere forsayde riuallus xxi chapiter sisillius wryters siluius brother gurgustius affermeth foresayde olde cronycle made chyef ruler brytayne yere worlde iiii thousande v hundred xxi ye englyshe boke named seyzill whych mencyon made nother reygne dedes excepte geffrey monmouth wryter ye hystoryes brytons sayth reygned two yeres whyche sayenge accordaunte wyth wryters couenyency tyme agrement cronyclers accordyng sayeng forenamed old authour reygned ye terme xlix yeres dyed buryed caerbadon bathe lefte hym none heyre bodye begotten xxii chapiter iago lago ye cosyne gurgustius wytnesseth gaufryde nexte inherytoure made gouernour britayne yere worlde iiii thousande v hundred lxx also y vnmynded wryters restfulnesse tyme ellys rudenesse dedes clerkes lyste spede tyme wrytynge dedes hym nothynge specyfyed sauynge forenamed olde authoure ioyneth tyme reygne xxv yeres also sayth dyed wythoute issue buryed hys cosyn caerbrank yorke xxiii chapiter binimacus sonne sisilli wryters haue verytably sayth olde cronycle ye brother lago made ruler brytayne yere world iiii thousand iiii hudred lxxx xv whyche brother hym passed tyme without notable actes dedes hym memorye made brother party wrote faytes dedes brytons make shorte rehersayll v kynges yt saye ryuallo gorbodug sayeng ryuallo succedyd gurgustius hym succedyd lago lago succedyd kinimacus kinimacus succeded gorbodug v kynges ruler made lytell mencyon thenne yt foloweth sayd olde cronicle kinimacus reygned liiii yeres dyed buryed brother caerbrak york leuynge hym sonne testyfyeth flos historiaru whych sonne named gorbodug xxiiii chapiter gorbodug sonne kinimac made ruler brytayne yere worlde folowynge foresayde accompt iiii thousande v hundred xlix whych passed tyme lyke vnto forenamed duke kynges wythout specyall memory honour noted writer lykelyhode brynge historyes accorde shulde reygne ouer brytons terme lxiii yeres whych terme endyd dyed lyeth buryed new troy lodon leuyng hym two sonnes named ferrex porrex wryters ferreus porreus xxv chapiter ferrex wyth porrex hys brother sonnes gorbodug ioyntly made gouernours duke britayne yere worlde foure thousande vii hundred xi contynued amytye certayne tyme whyche tyme expyred witnessyth policronica also gaufride porrex beynge couetouse lordeshyp gaderyd peple vnwetynge ferrex brother entendynge destroy hym wherof beynge warned lacke space assemble people sauegard persone fled sodeynly gallia frauce axyd ayd duke gallia named gaufryde gunhardus suardus whych duke hym ayded sent hym agayne brytayne hoste gallis whose ladynge brother porrex brytos hym mete gaue hym batayll whyche batayll ferrex slayne ye part peple dyscordeth myn authour wyth wryters wyth cronycle englande testyfye porrex slayne ferrex suruyuyd whether lyuyng moder two brethern named widen settynge parte moderly pytye help woman entred chambre hym lyuynge nyght hym slepynge slew cruelly cut small peces thus dyed two foresayde bretherne thus ruled brytayne warre peace agrement moste wryters v yeres xxvi chapiter endeth lyne sprynge brute affermaunce moste wryters gaufride saith deth forenamed bretherne great discorde arose amonge brytons longe tyme among continued meane wherof people cou tre sore vexed noyed vnder v kynges saith guydo de columna brytons abhorred lynage gorbodug myche fyrste one brother slew innaturall dysposycyon morder cruelly slew owne chylde cronycle englande sayth deth two forenamed bretherne ryghtfull enherytour lefte lyue wherfore people brought great discorde myche land deuydyd foure partyes albania one ruler loegria logiers one ruler cambria thyrde duke ruler cornewayle iiii duke ruler iiii duke english cronicle alloweth cloton duke cornewayll moste ryghtefull heyre policronyca sayth ye deth foresayde two bretherne great dyscorde lande whyche greuyd people sore vnder v kynges nother reheseth name tymes theyr regnes excepte addeth sayde dyscorde contynued tyll tyme moliuncius dumuallo yt appereth tyme certayn loge varyaunce dyscorde amog brytons contynued lyst loke vpon draught made english ye beginnyng boke shall se yf please caste ouer tymes yeres expressed forsayde discorde contynued nere terme li yeres whyche draught conceyte yf man fynde erroure goodnes lette hym amende correcte yt place shall good profe fynde place correccyon xxvii chapiter thus endyth ye fyrst parte worke conteynynge dyuyded vii partes shewed waye thank gyuen moste blessyd aduocate helper wretch lyste call meane ye moste blessyd vyrgyne lady saynt mary moder cryste yt grace hath fortheryd worke hytherto impetrate grace ayde moste mercyfull contynuauce accomplysh worke begonne shewed vnder supporte bouteous grace wyll wyth humble mynde salute wyth fyrste ioye ye vii ioyes whych begynneth gaude flore virginali c moste virgynall floure moste excellent persynge angelles hyest hierarchy ioye glad god omnipotent hath lyft vp sette moste worthily aboue nomber gloryous company blessyd sayntes wyth moste hye dignite nexte hym moste honoured fyrst parte accompted fyrste yere brute vnto laste yere foresayde dyscorde vnto fyrste yere mulmutius includyth yeres vii hundred foure pthus endeth fyrste parte seconde parte xxviii chapiter mulmutius dunuallo haue dunuallo mulmutius sonne cloten testyfyeth englyshe boke also gaufride venquesshour ye duke ruler began reygn ouer hole monarchy brytayne yere worlde iiii thousand vii hundred xlviii named englyshe cronycle donebant whyche noble man causyd made wythin cytye troynouant temple named temple peace whyche opynyons place feld ye market wollen cloth holden called named blakwelhall also made many good law long vsed called mulmuti lawes lawes holy gyldas wrote wyth great dylygence brettishe speche latyne longe tyme ye aluredus kynge england turned lawes oute latyne englyshe also gaue pryuylege temple plowghes cytyes wayes ledynge ye authours wytnesse beganne foure hye wayes brytayne whych fynyshed perfyted belinus sonne length shall declared olde cronycle testyfyeth yt mulmutius whyche boke nameth molle made two townes malmesbury uyes writer afferme mulmutius hadde stablyshyd lande sette brytons good conuenyent order aduyce lordes ordeyned hym crowne dyademe gold caused hym selfe crowned wyth great solempnyte vsaunce pagane lawe vsed cause opynyon wryters named fyrste kyng britayn ye rehersyd named ruler duke gouernours yt foloweth storye mulmuti guyded ye land well honorably terme xl yeres dyed buryed foresayde temple peace within troynouant lodon leuynge hym two sonnes named belinus brennus xxix chapiter belinus brenn two sonnes mulmutius beganne raygne ioyntly kynges brytayne yere world iiii thousande viiic viii belinus held hym loegria logiers walys cornewayll brennus held parte ye land ouer beyonde humber partycyon eyther cotentyd pleasyd testyfyeth polycronica terme v yeres whyche terme endyd expired brennus entendynge haue lande arose agaynste brother belyne made vppon hym mortall warre whych warre brennus ouersette co pelled flye land sayle vnto armorica named lytell britayn sayth gaufryde countre called allebrog shalbe playnely declared allyed hym foresayde terme sayd v yeres expyryd affermeth policronica gaufryde sayeth boke made hystory brytons yt ye terme v yeres afore sayde expyred runne brennus sterynge yonge euyll counsayll entedyng sayde sayled vnwetyng brother norway maryed doughter elfunge elfynge ruler duke norwaye shewed vnto belyn consyderynge sodayne departyng haste seasyd albania lande apperteynyng brenne owne hand strengthed cytyes stronge place wyth owne sowdyours wherof brenne warned possyble haste assembled great people norwayes toke hys shyppynge sayle brytayne kepynge course vpon see encountred wyth guilthdacus kynge denmarke whych lyen awayte hym loue ye wenche yt brennus maryed tyme requyred elfungeher fader whe ii flot mette strong shotte fyght vppon partyes fynally dane ouercame norwayes norganys toke shyppe strength whych weche yt whych anone brought vnto shyppe guilthdake brenne wyth fewe shyppes lefte fayne sauegarde hym selfe flyght guilthdake hadde thus obteyned ye vyctorye entendynge haue sayled towarde denmarke shorte whyle ye tempestes came hydous vppon see hys nauye deuyded scatered one frome suche wyse fere haue ben drowned ende fyue dayes wetynge wyth fewe shyppes landed cou tre northumberlande tyme belyn prouydyng defence agayne brother comyng wherof word brought vnto belyn landynge fore sayde danoys prynce wyth small company reioysed yt comau ded hym wyth shyppes company put sure holde kepynge long brene hadde reculyd gaderyd gyder parte hys nauye ye haue harde chased hadde theym newely ryggyd vytayled herynge aryuayll guilthdacus norththuberlad wife sent word manace vnto brother belyn wyllyng hym sende vnto hym wyfe wrogfully rauyshed guilthdacus also restore vnto land patrymony ellys wold shorthely inuade lande yt waste enymy destroye whych desyre request belynus playnely shortely denyed whych knowlege brenn shortly landed parte albania made towarde brother brother towarde hym yt theyr hostes met nere vnto wood named day calater calaterium betwene mortall batayll myche mych people fyll vpon partyes lastly brytons wanne felde chasyd norganys norway vnto theyr shyppes chasynge sleyenge without pyty affermeth myne authour ye fyght cruell sharpe slayne nomber xlm men dyscumfyture brenne constrayned flee wyth fewe nomber recoueryd lande gallia belinus hauyng thus victorye enemyes thankes oblacyons made vnto goddes pagane law assembled lordes caerbrank yorke haue theyr aduyse shuld wyth prynce denmark ye whych counsayle yt concludyd foresayd guylthdac shulde holde homage kynge britayn land demark yerely bere hym certayne tribute whyche done wyth suerty hostage taken sayde guylthdacus wyth loue sette lybertye leue retourne owne countre whych yerely tribute testyfyeth englyshe cronycle thousande pounde xxx chapiter yt foloweth ye hystory belyn hadde thus vyctory enemyes alone possessoure realme brytayne lawes made father cofermed ordeyned iustyce mynystred thorough lande myche iiii wayes begon fader perfyghtyd endyd therfore causyd workman called set theym paue wyth
